dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2546 IS: To provide for an extension of the legislative authority of the National Emergency Medical Services Memorial Foundation to establish a commemorative work in the District of Columbia and its environs.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Coons (for himself, Mr. Schmitt, Mrs. Shaheen, Mr. Cassidy, Ms. Warren, and Ms. Lummis) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To provide for an extension of the legislative authority of the National Emergency Medical Services Memorial Foundation to establish a commemorative work in the District of Columbia and its environs.

section.header: Extension of legislative authority for memorial establishment
section.text: Section 1(b) of Public Law 115â€“275 (132 Stat. 4164; 40 U.S.C. 8903 note) is amended by striking the period at the end and inserting , except that any reference in section 8903(e) of that title to the expiration at the end of, or extension beyond, a 7-year period shall be considered to be a reference to an expiration on, or extension beyond, November 3, 2032..
